title: [The Crystal Lotus, Showroom]
description: Framed on three sides by windows, the shop is brightly illuminated by the golden sunlight that trickles in through the glassless panes.  An oak and glass-front counter stands in the center of the polished linden floor, its top covered with a variety of glass jars and vials.

Framed on three sides by windows, the shop is brightly illuminated by several candlelit wall sconces.  An oak and glass-front counter stands in the center of the polished linden floor, its top covered with a variety of glass jars and vials.
